about: Results-driven Front-end React JS Development Engineer with 2+ years of experience in creating reusable web components and translating designs into high-quality code. Proven in debugging and requirement analysis, with a background in data analysis and SEO/web development. Experienced Content Analyst, generating and analyzing articles for quality. Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the University of Perpetual Help System Dalta. Passionate about leveraging skills to innovate and create impactful digital experiences.
